name: Zen Harmony House
description:
CHECK THE YELLOW IMAGES WHEN SELECTING YOUR ROOM TYPE

Good news for meditators! Our lowest prices are reserved for keen or experienced meditators 

CHEAPEST prices listed are available to meditators committed to joining us for 30 minutesat 2pm or 8pm on every day booked including your check-in day, PLUS at 7am for 60 minutes the morning after each night booked (1 x 30 min session daily and 1 x 60 min session the morning after).
Committing to our meditation programme but not joining the required sessions will cost more than our standard non-meditation price. 
CHECK THE YELLOW IMAGES WHEN SELECTING YOUR ROOM TYPE

Free daily meditation sessions | Prices available for non-meditators | Non party Non Alcohol Non Smoking Accommodation | Cats and Dogs to cuddle

If our only availability listed is our meditation price and you want to stay without joining our programme, book this anyway and inform us before or at your check-in that you don't wish to commit to our sessions. We'll update your price (an additional $15-$20 per night) to reflect the standard non meditation price. 

Our standard non-meditation prices are for guests who wish to stay with us without committing to our meditation programme. You're still welcome to casually join sessions if you wish. It is strongly recommended to book on our standard non meditation price if you have doubts about committing to our sessions or do not meditate regularly to avoid discomfort or extra fees for missing required sessions. 
You're then able to join our meditation sessions without fully committing to our programme.
CHECK THE YELLOW IMAGES WHEN SELECTING YOUR ROOM TYPE

Committing to our meditation programme but not joining the required sessions will cost more than our standard non-meditation price. 
CHECK THE YELLOW IMAGES WHEN SELECTING YOUR ROOM TYPE


Zen Harmony House is Sydney's most unique Non-alcoholic accommodation. Escape from disturbing hostel chaos and get some better rest. A sensible, peaceful crowd will be with you and joined by adopted dogs and cats to cuddle with. 

2 minutes from supermarkets and the city train | 20 minutes walk from the best views of the Opera House and Sydney Harbour | Bedside curtains in most dorms | Bed lights & powerpoints, fridges and WiFi in all rooms | 24 hour common areas

A place for guests who enjoy peace, quiet and good sleep. We appreciate the peaceful energy and harmony brought by keen and experienced meditators.

houseRules.notes:
HOUSE RULES
- This property caters to those who practice regular meditation. The lower rates displayed are only available to those satisfying meditation conditions which include fulfilling  1 x 30 minute session on the day of each booked night at 2pm or 8pm, and 1 x 60 minute session at 7am on the morning after. The standard rate ($15 extra) plus an admin fee of $5 will be charged for each night you do not meet those conditions.  You are welcome to book at the discounted rate to secure a bed, and pay the balance of the standard rate without the admin fee on check-in if you do not wish to participate in meditation. Note that if you arrive after 8pm, you will not be able to fulfill the discount conditions and will be automatically charged the normal rate for your first night.  Please check if you are able to do this before making a non-refundable booking.
- NO ALCOHOL - Zen Harmony House is a dry hostel. You may not consume alcoholic beverages on the premises.
- $50 per person  Security Bond payable upon checking in. This will be refunded on checkout given that keys are returned and hostel rules have not been broken. Hostel rules include but are not limited to:
- No visitors (all guests must be checked-in by reception)
- No consumption of illegal substances on premises
- Clean up after yourself. Cleaning fees up to $20 apply if you don't.
- Read/heed signs around the hostel.
- Loss of security deposit and eviction may result from disrespectful behavior. Just be good!
- Payments by credit card will incur a 5% service fee.
- Although every effort will be taken to keep group bookings together, we cannot guarantee that every person will be in the same room.
- Top and bottom bunks are allocated to bookings made via online travel agents on stand-by basis, bottom bunks are reserved in-house for a higher price. Please do not change beds without notifying staff first.

CANCELLATION POLICY
- Any night of your reservation will be charged if we are given less than 1 calendar day's notice of cancellation. (For example, a night on Saturday will not be refunded if notice of cancellation is given on Friday, even if you have checked in on Wednesday).
- The above cancellation policies do not apply to bookings made on non-refundable rates, or for the period between 20th December and 2nd January (See below)
